sagex.phoenix.vfs

Class CombinedMediaFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.vfs.DecoratedMediaFolder
      • sagex.phoenix.vfs.CombinedMediaFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<IMediaResource>, java.lang.Iterable<IMediaResource>, IMediaFolder, IMediaResource

    public class CombinedMediaFolder
extends DecoratedMediaFolder
    A Combined Media Folder is a special decorated folder that takes all the children of the parent folder and promotes them to top level items.

    This is typically used for sage sources, where you want to present all sources as single folder layout.
